starts.title: Both players shake hands with each other
starts.extra: ... warmly, using both hands and eye contact

starts.title: Give each other a side-hug
starts.extra: Also, hold it 20 seconds and synch breathing

examples.title: Give each other a warm shoulder squeeze
examples.extra: Follow with a slow 5‑count back pat

examples.title: Sit shoulder-to-shoulder and count to 15 together
examples.extra: Lean heads together for 10 more seconds

examples.title: Hold both hands for 10 seconds while smiling at each other
examples.extra: Trace tiny circles with your thumbs

examples.title: Back‑to‑back lean and breathe together for 20 seconds
examples.extra: Close your eyes and sync five breaths

examples.title: Walk arm‑in‑arm once around the space
examples.extra: Do a tiny two‑step while linked

examples.title: Sit facing each other, knees touching, and hold both hands
examples.extra: Keep eye contact for a slow count of 10

examples.title: Lie side‑by‑side and hold hands between you (clothed)
examples.extra: Bring foreheads together for 10 seconds

examples.title: Spooning (clothed) with gentle caresses along back and arms over clothing
examples.extra: Afterwards, hold face‑to‑face eye contact for 10 seconds

examples.title: Sit‑in‑lap cuddle (clothed), arms around each other, and hold for a minute
examples.extra: Maintain steady eye contact and slow synchronized breathing

examples.title: Sit with knees touching and chat softly for 20 seconds
examples.extra: Maintain gentle eye contact for the last 5 seconds

examples.title: Give each other a slow hand massage for 20 seconds
examples.extra: Switch hands and repeat for 20 more

examples.title: Touch foreheads for 10 seconds
examples.extra: Add a soft nose‑to‑nose nuzzle for 3 seconds

examples.title: Side‑hug for 20 seconds
examples.extra: Synchronize your breathing while holding

examples.title: Full hug for 20 seconds
examples.extra: Sway gently together for 10 more seconds

examples.title: Back hug for 20 seconds with arms around waist (over clothes)
examples.extra: Whisper a kind compliment while holding

examples.title: Sit on each other's laps (clothed) and hug for 15 seconds
examples.extra: Switch laps and repeat

examples.title: Sit face‑to‑face, legs intertwined (clothed), and hold a close hug
examples.extra: Maintain a soft cheek‑to‑cheek press for 10 seconds

examples.title: Current player rests their head on the other player's shoulder
examples.extra: Switch roles and repeat

examples.title: Cheek‑to‑cheek hug for 20 seconds
examples.extra: Switch cheeks and repeat

examples.title: Current player lies with head in the other player's lap (clothed, comfortable)
examples.extra: Offer a gentle over‑clothes shoulder rub for 10 seconds

examples.title: Both players trade 30-second back massages over clothes while seated side-by-side
examples.extra: Use massage oil

examples.title: Sit on the floor, one behind the other, and lean back‑to‑chest (clothed)
examples.extra: Swap roles and repeat

examples.title: Stand chest‑to‑chest and hug (clothed) for 15 seconds
examples.extra: Extend to 30 seconds with slow breathing

examples.title: Spooning on couch or floor (fully clothed) for 30 seconds
examples.extra: Synchronize a slow count to 20

examples.title: Stand behind the other and wrap arms around chest (over clothes) for 30 seconds
examples.extra: Rest chin on shoulder and sway slowly

examples.title: Lie chest‑to‑chest (clothed) with full‑body cuddle for 40 seconds
examples.extra: Place one hand over the other player's heart (over clothing) and breathe together

examples.title: Tightly spoon (clothed) with legs intertwined
examples.extra: The front player guides the back player's hand to a comfortable over‑clothes chest hold

examples.title: Tight spooning (clothed) with one arm draped over torso
examples.extra: Guide that hand to a comfortable hand‑on‑chest position over clothing

examples.title: Straddle hug sitting face‑to‑face (clothed) and hold for 20 seconds
examples.extra: Breathe in sync for 10 more

examples.title: Lie chest‑to‑chest (clothed) and embrace for 20 seconds
examples.extra: Add a gentle over‑clothes back rub

examples.title: Lie spooning under a blanket (clothed) and hold a full‑body cuddle for 60 seconds
examples.extra: Synchronize your breathing and squeeze gently on each exhale

examples.title: Lie chest‑to‑chest under one blanket (clothed) and hold perfectly still for 60 seconds
examples.extra: Place one ear over the other's heartbeat for the last 10 seconds
